# ARS Repair Inc.

> ARS Repair Inc. provides licensed, insured appliance repair and installation across 20+ cities in South Florida. Factory-trained, certified technicians serve residential, commercial, and hospitality clients. Services: dishwasher, washer, dryer, refrigerator, freezer, stove, oven, range hood, microwave, and gas appliance repair. Transparent pricing, flat-rate estimates, emergency appointments available. Contact: (954) 376-3086 or info@arsrepairs.com

All technicians are factory-trained, licensed, and include licensed gas fitters. We support all major appliance brands and provide manufacturer warranty service. Service areas span from Miami and Miami-Dade County to Fort Lauderdale, West Palm Beach, and throughout South Florida.

## Booking & Contact

- [Schedule Service](https://arsrepairs.com/schedule-service/): Book appliance repair service online with certified technicians, choose your appliance type, and select a convenient appointment time
- [Contact Us](https://arsrepairs.com/contact-us/): Get quotes, ask questions, request emergency service, or speak with our dispatch team directly

## Services
- [Dishwasher Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/dishwasher-repair/): We restore dishwashers that won't start, won't clean, won't drain, or stop mid-cycle, ensuring proper washing and drying performance.
- [Washer Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/washer-repair/): Repairs for washers that leak, shake, won't spin, won't fill, or stop early, restoring smooth, balanced, and complete wash cycles.
- [Dryer Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/dryer-repair/): We fix dryers that won't heat, won't tumble, take too long to dry, or run with loud noises caused by worn belts or failing sensors.
- [Refrigerator Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/refrigerator-repair/): Reliable repairs for cooling loss, leaks, noise, and temperature faults to keep food safe and your fridge running dependably.
- [Freezer Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/freezer-repair/): We fix freezers that won't cool, frost up, leak, or cycle irregularly, restoring stable temperatures and preventing food spoilage.
- [Stove / Cooktop Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/stove-cooktop-repair/): Service for electric, gas, and induction cooktops with ignition issues, uneven heat, dead burners, cracked glass, or weak temperature control.
- [Oven / Range Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/oven-range-repair/): Repairs for ovens and ranges that won't heat, cook unevenly, shut off, or struggle to maintain temperature for consistent results.
- [Range Hood Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/range-hood-repair/): Repairs for weak suction, loud fans, dead motors, or lighting issues to restore proper ventilation and safe kitchen air quality.
- [Microwave Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/microwave-repair/): We repair microwaves with no heat, turntable failures, loud buzzing, door switch faults, or electrical issues affecting performance.
- [Gas Appliance Repair](https://arsrepairs.com/our-services/gas-appliance-repair/): Safe repairs for gas ovens, stoves, and ranges with ignition failure, flame issues, gas odours, or temperature problems.

## Parts & Resources

- [Parts](https://arsrepairs.com/parts/): Genuine appliance parts supplier for all major brands, with expert guidance and fast support for DIY repairs or professional installation
